name: DON'T WAKE THE NIGHT -- MYSTERIOUS DEMO
name_original: DON'T WAKE THE NIGHT -- MYSTERIOUS DEMO
description:
MUSIC BY Halina Heron

PROGRAMMING MAGIC BY Karlo Feliciano

DEMO INSTRUCTIONS

-Only one clickable object

KNOWN ISSUES

-Camera stutter, particularly when swapping perspectives

-Resolution on settings button is a bit wonky on Mac

-Audio will sometimes cancel itself out, in case this happens click Settings > Volume
